name: Mind Treat Studios
description: Mind Treat Studios is an App Development company. Founded in 2011 the firm has Ad agencies and brands collaborating with them to create and implement top-notch projects on a variety of platforms including Kinect, iOS, Augmented Reality, Facebook, Android and everything new. They have been proudly working with the likes of McCann Romania, BBDO Russia, Publicis Romania, Saatchi&Saatchi Romania and Lürzer’s Archive Austria.

locations.address: Representation Slovenia&Croatia Umer Artists Agency Mitja Umer Gradaška 8
